renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )                        // rotation                  
#define B(a,l)    t = min( t, max(  max(A(a).x,A(a).y)-1., A(a).z-l )), // bar
#define C(a,r,l)  t = min( t, max(  length( (a).xy )  -r , A(a).z-l )), // cylinder
#define A         abs

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    
    float t=9., a, T = 6.283*iTime;
    vec3  R = iResolution, e = vec3(7,-7,0), X=e.xzz, Y=e.zxz, Z=e.zzx,
          M = iMouse.xyz/R,
       // M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R : vec3(.3,.05,0)*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)),
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -2.*R.y ) - R ),      // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q,s,r;                              // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.015 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot(.2 -3.*M.y),                         // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(   -3.*M.x),
        q.xy += 12.,
        B( A(q)          -X-X, 8. )                      // large bars
        B( A(q.zyx)        -X,16. )                      // long bars
        B( A(q.xzy-Z     ) -Y, 8. )                      // vertical bars
        B( A(q.zyx+Z-.3*Y) -X, 8. )                      // 2nd layer
        B( A(q.zyx+Z-.5*Y) -X, 8. )                      // 
        B(   q    -1.8*Y+.2*X, 8. )                      // top bar
        C(   q - .4*e.yxz  , .5,  9.)                    // catapult axe
        C(   q +1.2*X -.5*Y, .5, 11.)                    // cable axe 
        C(   A(q) -1.55*X  , .5, 11.)                    // wheels axes
        C( A(A(q)- 1.55*X) -1.3*Z , 3., 1. )             // wheels
        s = q, s.x -= 11., s.xy *= rot(.79), 
        B( A(s.xzy-Z) -Y, 8. )                           // slanted bars
        a = .59+ .6* atan(8.*sin(T))/1.6,                // catapult arm angle
        s = q - .4*e.yxz, s.xy *= rot(a),
        B( s.xzy -Z, 8. )                                // catapult arm
        C( s.zyx -2.4*Y, 3.5, .5 )                       // catapult plate
        a < .1 ? s.x -= 50.*mod(T+2.66, 6.283) : a,      // boulder trajectory
        t = min( t, length(s-vec3(1.5,17.5,0)) -2.),     // boulder
        p += t*D;                                        // step forward = dist to obj          
 // O *= vec4(.7,.4,.2,1);                               // coloring
}
